block.title: Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE) setup page
block.text: To properly use this add-on, you must have a network input configured to receive events from the ISE server.
If a syslog input is already enabled on your Splunk Server, you can leave the fields empty and click save
Otherwise, fill out the text boxes below and click Save once.
You have successfully created the input when you see a blue bar at the top of the screen with the message: "Successfully updated "Splunk_CiscoISE".
